title: Pearls and Corals Necklace
materials: 22K Gold. Features lustrous South Sea Pearls (Moti)
and vibrant Coral beads. Diamond accents
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a delicate flower motif pendant studded with pearls and diamonds. The necklace chain features a symmetrical pattern of pearls and Coral beads, punctuated by Aqua Carvin stones. The pendant is embellished with dangling coral and pearl beads, exuding a sense of traditional South Indian charm with a touch of modern elegance.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Equally suitable for contemporary events
adding a touch of heritage to your modern attire.
description: This necklace offers a unique blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibility. The lustrous pearls and vibrant coral beads create a captivating contrast. The detailed craftsmanship ensures both beauty and durability, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come.
